headline: Why Caesars Entertainment (CZR) Stock Is Up Today
summary: Shares of hotel and casino entertainment company Caesars Entertainment (NASDAQ:CZR) jumped 3.2% in the afternoon session after the company announced that sports fans in Missouri could now register and fund their accounts on its Caesars Sportsbook mobile app. The move allowed sports fans aged 21 and older to create their mobile sports wagering accounts ahead of the state's official sports betting launch on December 1. By opening registration early, Caesars positioned itself to capture a new marke

headline: 3 Stocks Under $50 We Keep Off Our Radar
summary: The $10-50 price range often includes mid-sized businesses with proven track records and plenty of growth runway ahead. They also usually carry less risk than penny stocks, though they’re not immune to volatility as many lack the scale advantages of their larger peers.
